title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create an object representing a book:
1. Create object with: title (string), author (string), pages (number), isRead (boolean)
2. Display the title
3. Change isRead to true
4. Add a new property 'rating' with a number 1-5
5. Display the entire object
instructions:
Create an object representing a book:
1. Create object with: title (string), author (string), pages (number), isRead (boolean)
2. Display the title
3. Change isRead to true
4. Add a new property 'rating' with a number 1-5
5. Display the entire object

hints.text: let book = {title: '...', author: '...', pages: 300, isRead: false};

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
commonMistakes.correction:
Forgetting commas between properties:
   {name: 'Alice' age: 25}  // WRONG - missing comma
   {name: 'Alice', age: 25}  // CORRECT

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
